h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Crossing a short rope bridge high above the gorge you came in through, you'll reach a large rocky snowfield with low visibility due to snowy winds. Many Frozen Corpses are scattered around this area can be tough to pick out as you advance, so move cautiously.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Snow-Veiled Trail'.
The content is as follows:
Crossing a short rope bridge high above the gorge you came in through, you'll reach a large rocky snowfield with low visibility due to snowy winds. Many Frozen Corpses are scattered around this area can be tough to pick out as you advance, so move cautiously.
